participant_1.name: Kate
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys creativity and teaching others.
participant_1.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i just got a job working in a gas station. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple.

participant_2.name: Liz
participant_2.personality: ambitious and humorous, with a creative flair and a love for cleanliness.
participant_2.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i have two grown children who never visit.

content.text: Hi! What is your name? üòÇ üòÇ

Hi! My name is Kate, I'm 56
And what's your name?
i'm good how are u i'm liz
i'm fine, thanks
i started my new job at google last week . where do you work ?

I worked at school as a drawing teacher
I used to be a painter, but now I'm a housekeeper
cool . maybe you know my nephew ? he's in school and says i'm the best aunt ever !

No
I don't know him
It was long ago when I worked at school
i am in culinary school , and want to open a restaurant named the wall . how is it going ?

I'm fine, thanks
How are you?
oh feeling good . my house is sparkling clean . love cleaning
What else do you love?
i love animals a lot

And what is you dream? Is it connected with animals?
As for me I'm dreaming about taking over the world
This is my fantasy
my dream is pizza in italy ! nearly there ! haha . what do you do for a living ?

My children decided that it is time to have a rest for me
I have 2 grown children
They earen a lot of money, and from time to time send me money
We live separately and they don't even visit me
Too busy as always
i also have two . jack and jillian i'm good . how are you ? üòù

I have answered this question twice
Nothing changed
I'm still fine
then why did you have grammar error if you are so smart ?
I hadn't say that
its okay baby , take your time üòÇ
